title: To: Palm Bay Police Department – Records Division Subject: Public Records Request: BWC/Dash-Cam (Case #2025-00003532) - Cayla Anne Geib

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Subject: Public Records Request: BWC/Dash-Cam (Case #2025-00003532) - Cayla Anne Geib

Dear Records Custodian,

This is a formal request for all body-worn camera (BWC) and dash-camera footage related to the arrest of Cayla Anne Geib on May 7, 2025.

To ensure the requested footage covers the specific legal and evidentiary elements of the case, please include the following segments:

Standardized Field Sobriety Tests (SFSTs): Full coverage of the roadside sobriety evaluation, including any dash-cam footage that provides a wide-angle view of the subject's physical performance.

The "Resisting" Incident: All footage capturing the specific interaction that led to the charge of Resisting Officer Without Violence. We are specifically looking for the verbal and physical dialogue during the handcuffing or transport process.

Breathalyzer/BAC Evidence: Footage capturing the administration of the breath test (Intoxilyzer), the observation period, and the verbal announcement of the results (BAC levels) or the subject's refusal to provide a sample.

Audio Records: All clear audio of the subject's statements regarding alcohol consumption and the initial accident/property damage.

Please provide a secure link for digital download once the redacted files are ready for release

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Petro Vozniuk

title: To: Melbourne Police Department – Records Division Subject: Public Records Request: BWC and Incident Reports (Case #2025-00039089) - Cecilia Pezo Yun

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Specific Evidence Requested:

Arrival and Initial Contact: Footage from the Melbourne PD officers responding to the call regarding "Disorderly Intoxication" at the public place/scene.

The Disturbance: All video documenting the alleged conduct that "caused a disturbance," which led to the initial charge.

Resistance Incident: Full, unedited footage of the interaction leading to the charge of Resisting Officer Without Violence. We are looking for visual and audio evidence of the commands given by the officers and the subject's response.

Transport/Booking: Any BWC footage during the transport to the Brevard County Jail that captures the subject's state of sobriety and verbal statements.

Case Information:

Subject: Cecilia Pezo Yun

Arresting Agency: Melbourne Police Department

Case Number: 2025-00039089

Date of Arrest: 05/04/2025

Please provide an invoice for any redaction fees prior to processing. If the footage is available in a digital format, I prefer a secure download link (e.g., Evidence.com).

Thank you for your assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Petro Vozniuk
